b7c14a33-cac8-4689-9422-3b7b73d98a24.description: The ANVIL Deployment Specialist certification program prepares developers with the requisite knowledge to install and configure new deployments of the ANVIL Suite. This training covers a variety of deployment architectures suitable for both cloud-based and on-premise hosting. This certification ensures that individuals have solid foundational knowledge of how all ANVIL applications and technologies interact, how to manage containers and clusters, and how to troubleshoot common issues.
b7c14a33-cac8-4689-9422-3b7b73d98a24.name: ANVIL Deployment Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving certification as an ANVIL Deployment Specialist requires the successful completion of a three-day training course facilitated by one of IMRSV Data Labs' course instructors. Candidates will be taught and tested on key activities involved in the deployment, configuration, and administration of the ANVIL Suite.

070e1a4e-b042-4f87-9f5b-fd7da6146a04.description: The ANVIL Integration Specialist certification program teaches developers the best practices for configuring data models in Blueprint, and how to ingest, manipulate, and export data using Carbon and Conveyor according to best practices. This certification ensures that resources have solid foundational knowledge of how all ANVIL applications and technologies interact, how to manage its granular permissions models, how to integrate data, and how to troubleshoot common problems.
070e1a4e-b042-4f87-9f5b-fd7da6146a04.name: ANVIL Integration Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving certification as an ANVIL Integration Specialist requires the successful completion of a three-day training course facilitated by one of IMRSV Data Labs' course instructors. Candidates will be taught and tested on key activities involved in the deployment, configuration, and administration of the ANVIL Suite.

0e99a482-a86f-4e45-a501-7a96a6700337.description: The ANVIL Training Specialist certification program provides in-depth training on the extensive functionality available to analysts within the ANVIL Suite. This program prepares users with the knowledge they need to use the platform effectively and to provide training and assistance to others in turn. This certification is relevant to organizations that opt for a “train the trainer” approach, enabling a subset of superusers to provide Tier-1 support within their organization.
0e99a482-a86f-4e45-a501-7a96a6700337.name: ANVIL Training Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Achieving certification as an ANVIL Training Specialist requires the successful completion of a three-day training course facilitated by one of IMRSV Data Labs' course instructors. Candidates will be taught about, and be tested on, the extensive functionality available within the ANVIL Suite.

87004e5f-3a49-433a-a16f-7bae7c63aad0.description: This badge certifies that you are an official IMRSV Data Labs employee!
87004e5f-3a49-433a-a16f-7bae7c63aad0.name: IMRSV Data Labs Employee
